item.title: Welcome!
item.description:
Hello!

Hi, this is Joon and I will be writing about some of the things that I do while studying at the University of Minnesota - Twin Cities. I will be starting my first year of Master’s program in computer science.

I hope you enjoy your time here!

Thanks for visiting,

Joon
